Header: Welipenna Dakshina Highway accident claims a life
Content: One person was killed in an accident that occurred in the Dakshina Highway in Welipenna on Saturday April 4. Police  stated that a vehicle travelling from Galle to Kottawa had collided with a vehicle belonging to the Road Development Authority at 8.30 a.m. on Saturday morning. The person traveling in the motor vehicle from Galle, who suffered severe injuries was admitted to the Kalutara, Nagoda Hospital. It  was later reported that he had passed away. Police also stated that an individual travelling in the motor vehicle is ‘under shock.’
